SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") : SET &UC4RB_PASSWORD# = ""
: IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_PASSWORD*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# EQ "UC4RB_PASSWORD" : SET &UC4RB_PASSWORD# = &VALUE# : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
: PUBLISH &UC4RB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
: ENDIF
